comments.author: madthanu
comments.content: we actually saw more places in munnar da: 1. 2 'viewpoint's we stopped when we were going from cochin to munnar. I thought viewpoints were supposed to be places where you get a nice view till then... it did make us to check in after 8.30 though, saved one day's room rent 2. murugan koil... guess bad boys like u dint go up there 3. hotel saravana bhavan - never saw one crowded like that

comments.author: Jegan
comments.content: At "4 goats & Lots of Grass Inc", if they find us using the camera unauthorized ( i mean without paying that 25 ), you have to pay 25000 as penalty. I asked sivaguru why the hell they do that. He replied to me "macha, national security da.. what if we sell the pictures of indian natural wealth?" "Goyyala.. then why are they selling it for 25?" Getting money from tourists is very very easy. Just introduce new rules. _**\[Pradep\]Ah. Repeat Jegan . Indian Natural Wealth ? You should have showed me that on the hill. I didnt see it ? How does it look like exactly ? Like the thing in National Treasure and all ? :-P \[/Pradep\]**_
